text: aur yaad karo jab nabi ne apni baaz aurto se ek poshida baath kahi, pas jab us ne us baath ki qabar kardi aur Allah ne apne nabi ko us par agaah kar diya, to nabi ne thodi si baath to bataadi aur thodi si taal gaye, phir jab nabi ne apni us biwi ko ye baath bataayi to, wo kehne lagi, is ki qabar aap ko kis ne di, kaha sab jaanne waale, puri qabar rakhne waale Allah ne mujhe ye bathlaaya hai
